name: American Airlines First Class, CRJ900, PHX-OAK Trip Report
description:
In this video, I travel between Phoenix Sky Harbor and Oakland on an American Eagle CRJ700. The trip's in First Class and includes geographical highlights along the way, details of the onboard service, and all phases of the flight including takeoff and landing.

This was a Mesa Airlines flight for American Eagle.

Enjoy the video, and leave me a comment!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
